This version brings more stations:
+ More Guangdong stations
+ Get notified when stations are added
+ iPhone X optimization
+ Bug Fixes

這個版本為你帶來更多電台：
+ 更多廣東地區的電台
+ 接收新增電台的通知
+ iPhone X 優化
+ 錯誤修復

version_name: 3.0 is a big release. Here are all of the new features:    • New Control Screen: just tap the bottom bar to open and swipe down to hide.    • Favorites Skip: Seek through favorite stations from the command center

version_description:
Version 3.0 is a big release. Here are all of the new features:
    • New Control Screen: just tap the bottom bar to open and swipe down to hide.
    • Favorites Skip: Seek through favorite stations from the command center, lock screen, and the new control screen.
    • Search: Pull down to reveal the search bar. Supports English and Chinese
    • Widget: Quickly start playing your last station.
    • Theming: Night mode theme with automatic switching based on screen brightness.
    • Reordering: Long press to "drag and drop" and reorder your favorites or the stations list.
    • Improved Layout for iPad. More improvements for iPad are coming in future versions.

Accessibility Improvements for Vision Impaired users using VoiceOver:
    • Magic Tap (Two Finger Double Tap) to Pause/Play anywhere within the app.
    • App now responds to Magic Tap to Pause/Play while in the background.

3.0版本為你帶來：
• 新控制中心頁面：點擊播放列以展開，向下掃以隱藏。
• 快速轉台：適用於已加入我的最愛列表中的電台
• 搜尋：拉下頁面以搜尋電台，中英輸入均可。
• Widget：快速播放上一次收聽的電台。
• 顏色主題：程式會根據屏幕光度改變主題顏色。
• 個人化電台列表排序：長按於我的最愛列表的電台，可以按你的喜好重新排序。
• iPad頁面優化
• 輔助功能優化：Voice Over 可以控制播放模式

• 顏色主題：程式會根據屏幕光度改變主題顏色。
• 個人化電台列表排序：長按於我的最愛列表的電台，可以按你的喜好重新排序。
• iPad頁面優化
• 輔助功能優化：Voice Over 可以控制播放模式

If you are using iOS 9 or iOS 10 - do not update to this version. Please wait for 3.0.9

Version 3.0 is a big release. Here are all of the new features:
    • New Control Screen: just tap the bottom bar to open and swipe down to hide.
    • Favorites Skip: Seek through favorite stations from the command center, lock screen, and the new control screen.
    • Search: Pull down to reveal the search bar. Supports English and Chinese
    • Widget: Quickly start playing your last station.
    • Theming: Night mode theme with automatic switching based on screen brightness.
    • Reordering: Long press to "drag and drop" and reorder your favorites or the stations list.
    • Improved Layout for iPad. More improvements for iPad are coming in future versions.

Accessibility Improvements for Vision Impaired users using VoiceOver:
    • Magic Tap (Two Finger Double Tap) to Pause/Play anywhere within the app.
    • App now responds to Magic Tap to Pause/Play while in the background.

• 新控制中心頁面：點擊播放列以展開，向下掃以隱藏。
• 快速轉台：適用於已加入我的最愛列表中的電台
• 搜尋：拉下頁面以搜尋電台，中英輸入均可。
• Widget：快速播放上一次收聽的電台。
• 顏色主題：程式會根據屏幕光度改變主題顏色。
• 個人化電台列表排序：長按於我的最愛列表的電台，可以按你的喜好重新排序。
• iPad頁面優化
• 輔助功能優化：Voice Over 可以控制播放模式

Thank you for supporting HK Radio.
This is the last update to support iOS 9 and iPhone 4S. The following bugs are fixed in this version:
- Sleep timer button layout on iPhone 4S/5/5S/SE.
- Radio station list spacing.
- GDPR permission request alert prominence.

We are currently working on the next major release, which will bring many new features, coming early 2019. 
*The next version will not support iOS 9 and iPhone 4S*
If you would like to sign up to be a beta tester, please email hello@likelylabs.com

感謝各位一直以來對香港收音機的支持。
是次將會是iOS 9 及iPhone 4S的最後更新，錯誤修復如下：
-睡眠時鐘頁面設計（iPhone 4S/5/5S/SE）
-電台列表間隔
-因歐盟通用資料保護規則（GDPR）而新增的通知

另外，我們正為程式準備下一個較大型的更新，預計在2019年前段推出更多新功能。如果你有興趣加入為Beta試用者測試將推出的程式，歡迎電郵至 hello@likelylabs.com

*將來的更新並不適用於iOS 9 及iPhone 4S/5/5S/SE*

This update improves VoiceOver integration and accessibility for blind and limited sight users.
•Accessibility hints are now included for Stations and Favorites.
•Accessibility hint is added for edit favorites. When using VoiceOver, select the top Favorites title, and swipe to the left to access edit favorites.
•When using VoiceOver, a station can be added to favorites from the Stations list if it is selected while it is playing. e.g. select it twice. In Favorites, select the station again to remove it from favorites.
•When using VoiceOver, double tap with 2 fingers anytime to play and pause.

是次更新改善了VoiceOver以及整體的輔助使用功能。 
• 改善於電台及我的最愛列表的輔助功能提示 
• 新增輔助功能以編輯我的最愛： 使用Voice Over時，點選我的最愛頁面並滑向最左邊的標示即可編輯我的最愛。如果是在我的最愛頁面播放電台，再次點選將會把電台從我的最愛移除。
• 使用VoiceOver於電台頁面收聽電台時，點一下會播放電台，再點一下會加入/移除該電台至我的最愛。

This update improves VoiceOver integration and accessibility for blind and limited sight users.
•Accessibility hints are now included for Stations and Favorites.
•Accessibility hint is added for edit favorites. When using VoiceOver, select the top Favorites title, and swipe to the left to access edit favorites.
•When using VoiceOver, a station can be added to favorites from the Stations list if it is selected while it is playing. e.g. select it twice. In Favorites, select the station again to remove it from favorites.
•When using VoiceOver, double tap with 2 fingers anytime to play and pause.

是次更新改善了VoiceOver以及整體的輔助使用功能。 
• 改善於電台及我的最愛列表的輔助功能提示 
• 新增輔助功能以編輯我的最愛： 使用Voice Over時，點選我的最愛頁面並滑向最左邊的標示即可編輯我的最愛。如果是在我的最愛頁面播放電台，再次點選將會把電台從我的最愛移除。
• 使用VoiceOver於電台頁面收聽電台時，點一下會播放電台，再點一下會加入/移除該電台至我的最愛。

嘗試修復程式未能在背景運作而導致收聽中斷的問題
